DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effect OMT Exercises Education Pain Participants With Cervical Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine whether osteopathic manipulative treatment associate exercise pain neurocience education improve pain function individual chronic non-specific neck pain Design : randomize single blind control pragmatic trial conduct trial . Patients ( n=40 ) non-specific neck pain randomize receive 1 ) osteopathic manipulative treatment exercise pain neurocience education ( n=20 ) 2 ) exercise alone pain neurocience education ( n=20 ) . Participants receive 8 treatment 4 week . Clinical outcome obtain 1 week , four week 24 week end treatment . Methods : The primary outcome pain measure 11-point numerical pain rating scale . The secondary outcome disability measure Neck Disability Index , range motion measure Cervical Range Motion device , Pressure pain threshold measure electronic algometer , global perceive effect , Pain Self-Efficacy Questionnaire pain catastrophizing scale
